comments.body:
From what i tell zeronet actually IFRAME the targeted site, so please check iframe your style might be applied on the top but not the targeted iframe
this confused and me over so much and complicated a lot of things when i was to make a userscript that would work with multiuser to switch users
so it's actually mainsite which contain the 0 button and then an iframe with the site's contents
while this does not directly answer it, i hope it might make things clearer
